introduction: You can contact your local council to apply for Council Tax Benefit - you may be eligible to get money off your Council Tax bill. Enter your postcode to find your council's website for more information.
more_information: You can apply for Council Tax Benefit in different ways - find out more in [Council Tax Benefit](/council-tax-benefit "Council Tax Benefit").
overview: Contact your local council to apply for Council Tax Benefit and get money off your Council Tax bill
title: Apply for Council Tax Benefit
